info.name: Music Library - AWS Deployment
info.description: Music Library API configured for AWS RDS MySQL deployment. The application runs locally but connects to AWS RDS database at music-library-db.cv4kawuomqo5.us-west-2.rds.amazonaws.com. Use this collection to test the API with cloud database backend.

body.raw:
